name: part_015
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY1】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [zkXvWvTX_BE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: MC section between songs with Houshou Marine and Shirakami Fubuki discussing their performance and the event.
Transition video and introduction of Amane Kanata, Omaru Polka, and Inugami Korone.

scenes.song_name: 特者生存ワンダラダー!!

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、あの、怪しいところあったんだけど
subtitles.english: I had some shaky moments there...

subtitles.original: マリンちゃんの方全然見れてなくて
subtitles.english: I wasn't able to look at Marine-chan at all.

subtitles.original: 船長も実はフブちゃんの事全然見れてなかったんだけど
subtitles.english: Actually, the Captain wasn't able to look at Fubu-chan at all either.

subtitles.original: 船長は、なんか、最後の最後のラスサビになって急に
subtitles.english: At the very last chorus, the Captain suddenly...

subtitles.original: 「あれ、何だっけ？」ってなって
subtitles.english: ...was like, "Wait, what was next?"

subtitles.original: なんか「あれ、ちょっと待って、あれ、あれ、あれ...」
subtitles.english: Like, "Wait, hold on, uh, uh, uh..."

subtitles.original: 「あれ、こうだった。あれ、次なんだっけ？」みたいな
subtitles.english: "Oh, it was this. Wait, what's next?" something like that.

subtitles.original: 焦りが出て、ちょっと、あわあわしました
subtitles.english: I started panicking and got a bit flustered.

subtitles.original: おー、いや、でも、可愛かったですもんねー
subtitles.english: Oh, well, you were cute, so it's fine!

subtitles.original: ねー
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: まあ、なんかね、そのちょっと遅れちゃったりね
subtitles.english: Well, even the parts where you were a bit late,

subtitles.original: できてないところまで、可愛い！
subtitles.english: or couldn't quite do it, were cute!

subtitles.original: 優勝優勝！それは可愛くにょい！
subtitles.english: Victory, victory! That's "cute-nyoi"!

subtitles.original: お前...なんか...
subtitles.english: You're... what...

subtitles.original: ライブだぞ！やめるんだ！
subtitles.english: We're live! Stop it!

subtitles.original: さて、フブちゃん。3rd fesはね
subtitles.english: Now then, Fubu-chan. For 3rd fes,

subtitles.original: なんと言っても、やっぱり4期生や
subtitles.english: above all else, there's the 4th gen,

subtitles.original: 5期生、
subtitles.english: 5th gen,

subtitles.original: それに、ENやIDのみんな
subtitles.english: and everyone from EN and ID.

subtitles.original: そう！がついにね
subtitles.english: Right! They're finally...

subtitles.original: ついについによ！
subtitles.english: Finally, finally here!

subtitles.original: 同じ、同じステージに！わー！
subtitles.english: On the same, the same stage! Wow!

subtitles.original: これは超楽しみですよねー
subtitles.english: We're really looking forward to this!

subtitles.original: いやー、もう本当にもう、そわそわドキドキで
subtitles.english: Yeah, seriously, I'm all fidgety and excited.

subtitles.original: この後もね、我々、ソロ曲もありますしね
subtitles.english: And after this, we both have our solo songs too.

subtitles.original: そうだよ！私、なんかちょっともう出番終わったみたいな空気なっちゃったけど
subtitles.english: That's right! I feel like my turn is already over or something.

subtitles.original: まだソロ曲ありますからね！
subtitles.english: We still have our solo songs!

subtitles.original: 始まったばっかですからね、本当に
subtitles.english: It's really only just begun.

subtitles.original: どんなユニットが来るかとかもね
subtitles.english: Also, which units will be coming up next...

subtitles.original: そうそうそう、ぜひね
subtitles.english: Right, right, please...

subtitles.original: ちょっとぜひ予想して、ま、でも我々がもうここで終わっちゃったんで
subtitles.english: ...try to guess. Well, since we've finished our part here,

subtitles.original: 終わっちゃったんだよね、もう来ないことが
subtitles.english: we've finished, so it's known we won't be back.

subtitles.original: わかっちゃったけど...
subtitles.english: We know that now, but...

subtitles.original: え、もうこれっきりってこと？
subtitles.english: Wait, you mean this is it?

subtitles.original: そういうこと
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: どういうこと？マリンちゃん...
subtitles.english: What do you mean? Marine-chan...

subtitles.original: やっぱビジネスフレンドだったの？白上とは
subtitles.english: Was it just a "business friend" relationship with Shirakami after all?

subtitles.original: そんなわけないじゃんかー
subtitles.english: There's no way that's true!

subtitles.original: あーノリが、いや、ちょっとライブでテンション上がって変なノリになってるぞ
subtitles.english: Ah, the mood... no, my energy is up because of the live show and I'm being weird.

subtitles.original: 変なノリになってるよー
subtitles.english: You're definitely being weird.

subtitles.original: いやもうね、でもこの後も本当にいろんなね、メンバーが歌いますので
subtitles.english: Well, anyway, after this, many different members will be singing.

subtitles.original: まだまだここで力尽きちゃダメですからね、みなさん！
subtitles.english: So you can't run out of energy here, everyone!

subtitles.original: そうそう、こんな広い会場でちょっともう何でもできる
subtitles.english: Right, in such a large venue, you can do anything.

subtitles.original: そう、めちゃめちゃ広いでしょ？
subtitles.english: Yes, it's incredibly large, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ちょっと動き回る
subtitles.english: Gonna move around a bit.

subtitles.original: 待って待って、白上！待って、来ないで、あー来ないで、やめて
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, Shirakami! Wait, don't come over, ah, don't come over, stop it.

subtitles.original: 待て待て、足腰を...よし、倍返し！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, my legs... alright, double the payback!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ疲れとるやんけー、ハァハァ...
subtitles.english: I'm totally exhausted... *panting*...

subtitles.original: やばい、やばい、すごい広い
subtitles.english: Oh no, oh no, it's so wide.

subtitles.original: ライブ会場でちょっと暴れ散らかしてもろて
subtitles.english: Going a bit wild in the concert venue.

subtitles.original: ちょっと、あっちこっち、
subtitles.english: Wait, over here and there...

subtitles.original: あっちこっち、アピールアピール！
subtitles.english: Over here and there, appeal, appeal!

subtitles.original: アピールしていこう、イエーイ！イエーイ！決めたー！
subtitles.english: Let's appeal to them, yay! Yay! We did it!

subtitles.original: 見えとるかー、見えとるぞー
subtitles.english: Can you see us? We can see you!

subtitles.original: 元気？元気？大丈夫ですか？
subtitles.english: How are you? You good? Are you okay?

subtitles.original: おばあちゃんですか？
subtitles.english: Are you an old lady?

subtitles.original: ちょっと疲れちゃったね、ちょっとね
subtitles.english: I got a little tired, just a little.

subtitles.original: ちょっと暴れ散らかさないでいただいて
subtitles.english: Please stop going wild for a moment.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？大丈夫、大丈夫
subtitles.english: You okay? You're fine, you're fine.

subtitles.original: この後、ソロ曲もあるって言ってるでしょ
subtitles.english: I told you there are solo songs after this.

subtitles.original: あ、そう、そう、ソロ曲もあるからね、みんなね。ちょっとね
subtitles.english: Oh, right, right, there are solo songs too, everyone. Just a moment.

subtitles.original: ねー。そう、一体何を歌うんでしょうかねー、ソロ曲ねー
subtitles.english: Yeah. So, I wonder what we'll be singing for our solo songs?

subtitles.original: え、でもやっぱ船長、フブちゃんは、ちょっとぶっちゃけ「あれ」かなーって思ってるんだけど
subtitles.english: Well, but for the Captain, honestly, I'm thinking Fubu-chan will do "that".

subtitles.original: 「あれ」って何なの？
subtitles.english: What do you mean by "that"?

subtitles.original: 「あれ」って何かなー？でもマリンちゃんは「あれ」かな？
subtitles.english: I wonder what "that" is? But maybe Marine-chan will do "that"?

subtitles.original: いや、ちょっと待って、その「あれ」じゃないかも、
subtitles.english: Wait, hold on, it might not be that "that"...

subtitles.original: あの、でもなんか、リハの時とか、なんか「あれ？」
subtitles.english: But, like, during the rehearsal, it was like "Huh?"

subtitles.original: あー、あー
subtitles.english: Ah, ah.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、君たちは「あれ」だと思っているんだろうなあ
subtitles.english: Well, I bet you all think it's "that".

subtitles.original: 「あれ」だろうと、「あれ」だろうと思っているんだろうなあ
subtitles.english: You're thinking "that", or maybe "that".

subtitles.original: 本当かなー？
subtitles.english: I wonder if that's true?

subtitles.original: ちょっと気まずすぎる。でも「あれ」じゃないんだ、気まずいな
subtitles.english: This is getting too awkward. But it's not "that", how awkward.

subtitles.original: 白上はね、みんなの予想してる「あれ」だと思うので
subtitles.english: For Shirakami, I think it'll be "that" which everyone is predicting.

subtitles.original: ぜひね、いっぱいサイリウム振ってくださいね！
subtitles.english: So please, wave your glow sticks a lot!

subtitles.original: ちょ、なんかまるで、わー、船長も「あれ」です。船長も「あれ」で
subtitles.english: Wait, it's almost like... wow, the Captain is also "that". The Captain is also "that".

subtitles.original: 「あれ」って何？負けられ、
subtitles.english: What is "that"? I can't lose...

subtitles.original: いや、でも他のメンバーの曲もね、まだ、だって今、2曲目ですよ、まだ
subtitles.english: No, but the other members' songs too... I mean, it's only the second song so far.

subtitles.original: まだ、まだ2曲目ですからね！
subtitles.english: It's still only the second song!

subtitles.original: ていうかさ、よく考えたらさ、SSSをさ、
subtitles.english: Come to think of it, we already did SSS,

subtitles.original: 早速、消化しちゃったけど、どうすんの、この先？
subtitles.english: so what are we going to do for the rest of the show?

subtitles.original: 確かに、この後の全体曲？
subtitles.english: True, the group songs after this?

subtitles.original: そうよ。あー、どうしよう、わからない
subtitles.english: Exactly. Ah, what should we do? I don't know.

subtitles.original: わからない、あ、あ、あ...
subtitles.english: I don't know, uh, uh, uh...

subtitles.original: あー！ということで、そろそろお時間ですので、次の曲、次の曲行ってみましょう！
subtitles.english: Ah! So, it's about time, let's move on to the next song, the next song!

subtitles.original: 行きましょうか！はい、皆さんね、どんどん盛り上がっていってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Shall we go? Yes, everyone, keep getting more and more excited!

subtitles.original: いってらっしゃーい！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two...

subtitles.original: つながる！ホロライブ！
subtitles.english: Link! Hololive!

subtitles.original: バッ！ちょっと白上！白上！白上！あー！
subtitles.english: Pow! Wait, Shirakami! Shirakami! Shirakami! Ah!

subtitles.original: 天音かなた (AMANE KANATA)
subtitles.english: 天音かなた (AMANE KANATA)

subtitles.original: 尾丸ポルカ (OMARU POLKA)
subtitles.english: 尾丸ポルカ (OMARU POLKA)

subtitles.original: 戌神ころね (INUGAMI KORONE)
subtitles.english: 戌神ころね (INUGAMI KORONE)

subtitles.original: Nanubish-oryappash!
subtitles.english: Nanubish-oryappash!

subtitles.original: つかみも最高　本気（マジ）開始
subtitles.english: A perfect start, getting serious now

subtitles.original: 三者三様　究極パキ
subtitles.english: Three people, three ways, ultimate "paki"

subtitles.original: 天使の旋律　イッツ・マイ・くるくる
subtitles.english: An angel's melody, it's my "kuru-kuru"

subtitles.original: テキトーに頑張ろうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's just do our best casually

subtitles.original: そんなんだったええけどさ
subtitles.english: That's fine and all, but...

subtitles.original: 必死に頑張ろうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's work hard desperately

subtitles.original: それが僕ら仕様だ
subtitles.english: That's just how we are

subtitles.original: ダサすぎちゃ面目丸損
subtitles.english: It's embarrassing if we're too uncool

subtitles.original: ビンボーっちゃ面目丸損
subtitles.english: It's embarrassing if we're poor

subtitles.original: パンチがバッチリ
subtitles.english: Punches are perfect

subtitles.original: キマって何決まってる
subtitles.english: Looking good, what's decided?
